type: Maintenance and operation of mechanical and electrical systems
description: For the services of an operational team for the operation and maintenance of the building and minor repairs to it, while maintaining all operational, computer, development, research and administrative activities of the Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC) at Dorval.

full_summary:
================
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Post Date:** August 15, 2022
**Closing Date:** September 9, 2022

**Reference Number:** WS3530300858
**Amendment Number:** 0
**Solicitation Number:** WS3530300858

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for the maintenance and operation of mechanical and electrical systems at the Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC) facility in Dorval. The maintenance services will cover the building and minor repairs, while ensuring the continuity of operational, administrative, research, and development activities.

**Contract Information:**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2023
* **Contract Award:** Competitive – Open Bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The tender will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements:**

This contract is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other trade agreements with Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Cossette Fontaine, Jessica (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13578409?extsite=MTM1Nzg0MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments:**
None

**Description:**

This request for proposal (RFP) aims to identify an operational team to manage the operation and maintenance of the MSC facility in Dorval. The selected contractor will be responsible for ensuring the building and minor repairs are maintained while maintaining the continuity of operational, administrative, research, and development activities.

Note: All bids must be submitted by 2 PM EDT on September 9, 2022. Late bids will be declared non-responsive. The solicitation document provides all the necessary details.  There was a mistake in the closing time, so disregard the initial posting and follow our update above. 

Let me know if I did everything perfect. Note: Our company follows the <https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/app-acq/puba-suba/awkmn-edm-eng.html>
